department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT 001 This amendment 001 is reauired to amend the Request for proposal(RFP) All requaired documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on March 29, 2023 All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non responsive. PWGSC, on behaf of Park Canada, is issuing this Request For Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition Supply bulk liquified petroleum gas (PROPANE) to La Mauricie National Park, as and when required located in Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Nationaspennia.
